text:
Blackburn Ltd is seeking a skilled Bus and Truck Mechanics and Diesel Engine Specialist to join our team. As a leader in the transportation industry, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

Job Description:
We are looking for a dedicated and experienced individual to diagnose and repair diesel engines, perform routine maintenance, and ensure our fleet is running smoothly. The ideal candidate will have a strong work ethic, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work well under pressure.

Responsibilities:

 Diagnose and repair diesel engines, transmissions, and brake systems
 Perform routine maintenance tasks, such as oil changes and tire rotations
 Collaborate with other mechanics to ensure efficient workflow
 Maintain a clean and organized workspace

Qualifications and Experience:

 5+ years of experience as a bus and truck mechanic
 Strong knowledge of diesel engines and mechanical systems
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
 Valid driver's license

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program. We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $60,000 to $80,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. Additionally, we provide a safe and respectful work environment, with opportunities for professional growth and development.
